page.title: 01SUDBOROUGH BLOCK SUMMARY
page.content: The Sudborough block is mainly an agricultural area with woodland. The only residential area in the block is the village of Sudborough. Sudborough is a typical Northamptonshire village, small and quieT. There are approximately 140 residents in Sudborough, including the author B.B. The main industry in the area is farming. The main type of farming in the area is arable.The type of crops grown are wheat, barley and rape.There is cattle farming, but only on a small scale. Also a large area of the block is covered by woodland like Titchmarsh Wood which contains deer and other wildlife. The woodland contains mostly coniferous trees and few deciduous trees.
